next_24h.action: Publish one source-backed clarification for top active narrative.
next_24h.why: Protect brand trust with fast clarifications and source-backed updates.

next_24h.action: Activate keyword watchlist and alert thresholds for sudden volume spikes.

next_7d.action: Track daily claim deltas, repeated-text ratio, and shared-URL bursts.
next_7d.why: Separates organic discussion from coordinated amplification.

next_7d.action: Create reusable FAQ snippets for recurring claims.

next_30d.action: Add media provenance checks (hashing + metadata chain) for high-impact posts.
Benchmark thresholds against historical baselines and labeled samples.
next_30d.why: Reduces false positives and improves calibration.

communications_playbook.do: Clarify with timestamps and primary sources.
Debunk once with canonical evidence and pin the update.

response_templates.template: We are monitoring this topic and sharing only evidence-backed updates with source links and timestamps.
Our monitoring detected increased discussion. We are validating claims and will publish verified findings transparently.
